title: Diode
alt: And the worst part is you won't apologize.
transcript:
[Cueball is talking to Megan. Megan holds up a diode.]
Cueball: We need to talk.
Megan: Okay, but first hold the end of this diode.[They hold the diode.]
Cueball: You hurt my feelings yesterday.
Megan: You embarrassed me with my family last weekend.[They are still holding the diode between them.]
Cueball: I'm sorry.
